schema.[devserver]: The host name/ip address of the developer's server machine/vm, without a protocol or port, e.g. 'localhost' or '192.168.56.101'; use it only in 'development' sections

schema.errorToClientPolicy: Defines the level of verbosity of the errors that occur during requests reported to the client; one of "bare" | "normal"  "verbose"
schema.listenOnIp: The IP address for the fastify application to listen on, e.g. "0.0.0.0"
schema.listenOnPort: The port for the fastify application to listen on, e.g. 3000

schema.host: The host or ip address of the database server; e.g. "localhost"
schema.port: The port of the database server to connect on; e.g. 27017
schema.name: The name of the default database for the application; e.g. "samantha"
schema.limit: Default limit for all database queries; e.g. 500
